00028 class BListException : public std::exception
00029 {
00030   private:  
00031     int m_ErrCode;
00032     std::string m_Description;
00033 
00034   public:
00035     BListException(int ErrCode, const std::string& Description) :
00036     m_ErrCode(ErrCode), m_Description(Description) {};
00037 
00038     virtual int code(void) const { 
00039       return m_ErrCode; 
00040     }
00041 
00042     virtual const char *what(void) const throw() {
00043       return m_Description.c_str();
00044     }
00045 
00046     virtual ~BListException() throw() {
00047     }
00048 
00049     enum BLIST_EXCEPTION {E_NO_MEMORY, E_BAD_INDEX, E_DATA_ERROR};
00050 };

00052 struct BListStats
00053 {
00054 
00055   BListStats() : NodeSize(0), NodeCount(0), ArraySize(0), ItemCount(0)  {};
00056   BListStats(size_t nsize, size_t ncount, size_t asize, unsigned count) : 
00057      NodeSize(nsize), NodeCount(ncount), ArraySize(asize), ItemCount(count)  {};
00058 
00059   size_t NodeSize;    // Size of a node
00060   size_t NodeCount;   // Number of nodes in the list
00061   size_t ArraySize;   // Max number of items in each node
00062   unsigned ItemCount; // Number of items in the entire list
00063 };

00065 template <typename T, unsigned Size = 1>
00066 class BList
00067 {
00068   public:
00069     struct BNode
00070     {
00071       BNode *next;
00072       BNode *prev;
00073       unsigned count;        // number of items currently in the node
00074       T values[Size];
00075       BNode() : next(0), prev(0), count(0) {}
00076     };
00077 
00078     BList();                 // default constructor                        
00079     BList(const BList &rhs); // copy constructor
00080     ~BList();                // destructor                         
00081 
00082     BList& operator=(const BList &rhs) throw(BListException);
00083 
00084       // arrays will be unsorted
00085     void push_back(const T& value) throw(BListException);
00086     void push_front(const T& value) throw(BListException);
00087 
00088       // arrays will be sorted
00089     void insert(const T& value) throw(BListException);
00090 
00091     void remove(int index) throw(BListException);
00092     void remove_by_value(const T& value); 
00093 
00094     int find(const T& value) const;       // returns index, -1 if not found
00095 
00096     T& operator[](int index) throw(BListException);             // for l-values
00097     const T& operator[](int index) const throw(BListException); // for r-values
00098 
00099     unsigned size(void) const; // total number of items (not nodes)
00100     void clear(void);          // delete all nodes 
00101 
00102     static unsigned nodesize(void); // so the allocator knows the size
00103 
00104       // For debugging
00105     const BNode *GetHead() const;
00106     BListStats GetStats() const;
00107 
00108   private:
00109     BNode *head_; // points to the first node
00110     BNode *tail_; // points to the last node
00111     BListStats stats;
00112     void pop_front(void);
00113     bool empty(void);
00114     BNode* new_node(const T& value);
00115     void remove_node(BNode* todelete);
00116     bool full(BNode* isfull);
00117     void insert_after(BNode* insertafter, const T& value);
00118     void split_node(BNode* tosplit, const T& value);
00119     void insert_before(BNode* insertbefore, const T& value);
00120     BNode* copy_node(BNode* tocopy);
00121     void insert_into(BNode* insertinto, const T& value);
00122     //sorted variable
00123 
00124     // Other private methods you may need
00125     // copy node X
00126     // new node(T,T) X
